trait.name: Draconic Ancestry (Black Dragon)
trait.text: You have a Black Dragon ancestor. You have resistance to acid damage and a breath weapon.

trait.name: Breath Weapon (Acid)
trait.text: When you take the Attack action, you can replace one attack with a breath weapon that is a 15-ft. cone or 30-ft. line (5 ft. wide). Each creature must make a DC 12 Dex saving throw, taking 1d10 acid damage on failure, half on success. 2 uses per long rest.

trait.name: Damage Resistance (Acid)
trait.text: You have resistance to acid damage.

trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

trait.name: Draconic Flight
trait.text: Once per long rest as a bonus action, you gain temporary flight for 10 minutes. During that time, you have a fly speed equal to your walking speed.

trait.name: Fighting Style: Great Weapon Fighting
trait.text: When you roll damage for an attack with a melee weapon that has the Two-Handed or Versatile property, you can treat any 1 or 2 on a damage die as a 3.

trait.name: Second Wind
trait.text: You can draw upon stamina to regain 1d10+1 HP as a bonus action. 2 uses per long rest, regain 1 use per short rest.

trait.name: Weapon Mastery
trait.text: You have mastery with certain weapons, allowing you to use their special properties.

trait.name: Savage Attacker
trait.text: Once per turn when you hit with a weapon, you can roll the weapon's damage dice twice and use either roll.

action.name: Greatsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6+3 slashing damage. Graze: If the attack misses, deal 3 slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6+3 piercing damage.

action.name: Flail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8+3 bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Breath Weapon (Acid)
action.text: Replace one attack with a 15-ft. cone or 30-ft. line (5 ft. wide) of acid. Each creature in area makes DC 12 Dex save, taking 1d10 acid damage on failure, half on success. 2/long rest.

bonusaction.name: Second Wind
bonusaction.text: Regain 1d10+1 hit points. 2 uses per long rest, regain 1 use per short rest.

bonusaction.name: Draconic Flight
bonusaction.text: Gain fly speed equal to walking speed for 10 minutes. Once per long rest.
